Title: Oni (TV)
Description: ['Tonko House has partnered with Japanese stop-motion house "dwarf" and CG studio Megalis on the new project. Tsutsumi is the directing showrunner of a stop-motion/CGI animated TV series called “Oni,” about a human girl being raised by a mythical Japanese god. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Tonko House plans to show test footage of ', Oni, ' at its first-ever Tonko House Film Festival this spring in Tokyo. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (source: Variety.com)', ' ', ' ']
